Diseases.title: Disease Information Hub
Diseases.subtitle: Learn about common diseases, their symptoms, causes, and prevention

acidReflux.name: Acid Reflux (GERD)
acidReflux.description: A digestive disorder where stomach acid frequently flows back into the food pipe, causing irritation.
symptoms: Regurgitation of food or sour liquid

acne.name: Acne
acne.description: A skin condition that occurs when hair follicles become clogged with oil and dead skin cells.

alzheimer.name: Alzheimer's Disease
alzheimer.description: A progressive neurological disorder that causes memory loss and cognitive decline.
